entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 40

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
